content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5) supplying water.
- Pipe connections to various pipe groups.

### Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5) which is currently not connected to a power network.
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) which is currently not connected due to placement issues.
- Pipe connections to various pipe groups.

### Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) which has failed to connect to the steam engine.

### Electricity group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric poles at positions (-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-19.5, 22.5).

### Pipe groups
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple pipe groups facilitating fluid transport between the offshore pump and the steam engine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that there are no obstacles in the way of the boiler and steam engine connection points before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when placing entities
- Confirm that the target location is clear of other entities before placing a new entity. In this case, the boiler could not be placed due to an obstruction.

### Errors when using pipes
- Verify that the pipes are correctly positioned and that there are no gaps in the connections to ensure fluid transport is functional.

### Errors with power connections
- Check that all power connections are established properly to avoid entities being reported as not receiving power.
